title: elo booster in ranked
body: Hi. I just find out two players in ranked were elo booster. Because they just saying some chinese booster advertising after finish the game. Coz i'm Chinese so i definitely sure they are saying some advertising to let people pay money and help them booster up. i got a picture but i dont know how to post in here. The ID name is **name removed**  and **name removed** Plz checked and just title them up or give them the punishment they deserve. Thank you. {{item:1051}}

replies.body: no way an elo booster in ranked!!
